title._content: Debate Between Governor Charley Johns and Future Governor LeRoy Collins

tag.raw: State Library and Archives of Florida
tag.author: 31846825@N04

description._content: Local call number: V-97; EA010. Title: [Debate Between Governor Charley Johns and Future Governor LeRoy Collins.] Date of film: 1954. Physical descrip: B&W; sound; original film length: 42:18. General note: Excerpt of original. This debate between acting Gov. Charley Johns and future governor LeRoy Collins was filmed from a television monitor (kinescope) and simultaneously broadcast throughout Florida on radio. Moderator Ralph Renick tries valiantly to manage a timer and buzzer mechanism as the candidates argue the issues of the day. There are processing marks through most of film, but otherwise the quality is very good. To see full-length versions of this and other videos from the State Archives of Florida, visit www.floridamemory.com/video/. Repository: State Library and Archives of Florida, 500 S. Bronough St., Tallahassee, FL 32399-0250 USA. Contact: 850-245-6700. Archives@dos.state.fl.us Persistent URL: www.floridamemory.com/items/show/232388
